title: BRIGHT PREWAR GV TRUE 1 BED OASIS___ELEV/ LNDRY BLDG - GREAT FIND!
posting_body: ['FIRM LISTED RENT/ BROKER FEE WILL APPLY', 'EMAIL WITH NAME(S), MOBILE(S) AND MOVE DATE FOR ACCESS', '9/1 MOVE', 'Charming prewar 1-BR on prime West 12th Street in central Greenwich Village!', 'The spacious layout on the 5th floor of a beautifully maintained elevator building features three bright exposures with vistas over Greenwich Village rooftops.', 'Every room has at least one window (including the eat-in kitchen and the windowed bath) and the apartment immediately conveys a sense of comfort with large rooms, high ceilings, and beautiful hardwood floors with decorative inlay.', 'The classic 1890’s co-op building has charm galore, from its marble lobby with carved decoration, to stained glass windows, wood elevator cabs, and nicely furnished and planted garden patio.', 'Live-in super, laundry room, and bike storage (subject to availability) on site.', 'The location is prime; down the block to several subway lines: the 1,2,3 subways at 7th Avenue and the F, M and Path lines at 6th Avenue.', 'Union Square, Washington Square Park, and countless Village shops, restaurants and hot-spots are within a quick trip.', 'AVAILABLE SEPT 1.', 'This one won’t last!', 'EMAIL WITH NAME(S), MOBILE(S) AND MOVE DATE FOR ACCESS', 'FIRM LISTED RENT/ BROKER FEE WILL APPLY']
